scenes.description: The Hololive 4th Generation members (Kanata, Watame, Towa, Luna, and Coco) reflect on their journey and performance, recreate a famous height-comparison photo, engage in a playful pro-wrestling match, and finally prepare for Coco's final idol performance.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: 最高！本当に最高！
subtitles.english: The best! That was really the best!

subtitles.original: 愛されてるわ。
subtitles.english: You're so loved.

subtitles.original: 愛してるよ！
subtitles.english: I love you!

subtitles.original: みんな愛してるよ！
subtitles.english: I love you all!

subtitles.original: いや、やっぱ4期生の、この曲...
subtitles.english: Man, this 4th gen song...

subtitles.original: かなたんがね...
subtitles.english: Kanatan made it...

subtitles.original: 寝坊がきっかけですけど。
subtitles.english: ...and it all started with her oversleeping.

subtitles.original: 自腹でね、作らせていただいて。
subtitles.english: She paid for it out of her own pocket.

subtitles.original: 本当にみんなに歌ってもらえて、
subtitles.english: I'm so glad everyone could sing it,

subtitles.original: 最高の曲なのに。
subtitles.english: even though it's such a great song.

subtitles.original: 神曲！神曲！神曲！
subtitles.english: It's a god-tier song! A god-tier song!

subtitles.original: 本当にね、この卒業ライブの日に間に合うように、
subtitles.english: Honestly, I wanted it to be ready for this graduation live,

subtitles.original: この時歌えるようにと思ってね、作って...
subtitles.english: so that we could sing it at this very moment...

subtitles.original: もうこれで最後でもいいと思って作ったんで...
subtitles.english: I made it thinking it could even be the last thing I do...

subtitles.original: あ、
subtitles.english: Ah,

subtitles.original: あの、ちょっと言いたいことあるんですけど。
subtitles.english: Wait, I actually have something I want to say.

subtitles.original: なんかね、かなたんが配信とかでも
subtitles.english: You've said in streams and such

subtitles.original: 「これで最後でもいい」って言ってましたけど、
subtitles.english: that "it's okay if this is the last time,"

subtitles.original: この曲できればね、
subtitles.english: but if possible,

subtitles.original: 4期生みんなでね、また歌ってほしい...
subtitles.english: I want all the 4th gen members to sing it again...

subtitles.original: 私がいなくてもね、歌ってほしい...
subtitles.english: even when I'm gone...

subtitles.original: と思ってんだよね！
subtitles.english: ...that's what I'm thinking!

subtitles.original: 歌うしかないな、これはな！
subtitles.english: Then we have no choice but to sing it!

subtitles.original: そう、みんなで歌って。
subtitles.english: Yeah, everyone should sing it.

subtitles.original: まあちょっとね、4人...パートが分かれてるから、
subtitles.english: Well, since there are four of you... the parts are split up,

subtitles.original: 私のパート、名前も入ってるしな、歌詞に。
subtitles.english: and my part even has my name in the lyrics.

subtitles.original: まあでも、せっかく作った、
subtitles.english: But still, it's the song that was made with such care,

subtitles.original: 私の大好きな曲なんで。
subtitles.english: and it's a song I love so much.

subtitles.original: みんなが残り4人になっても歌ってるのを、私は聞きたいよ！
subtitles.english: I want to hear you four continue to sing it!

subtitles.original: 歌おう！
subtitles.english: Let's sing it!

subtitles.original: ココが言うなら、私達、意志継いで...
subtitles.english: If Coco says so, then we'll carry on her will...

subtitles.original: 歌っていこう！歌っていこう！
subtitles.english: ...and keep singing it! Let's do it!

subtitles.original: ありがとう。元気出そうよ。
subtitles.english: Thank you. Let's cheer up.

subtitles.original: 元気出そう、歌う、歌う。
subtitles.english: Let's cheer up and sing, let's sing.

subtitles.original: あ、せっかく...これちょっと、
subtitles.english: Ah, while we're here... wait,

subtitles.original: あれ？この並び...
subtitles.english: hold on. This line-up...

subtitles.original: なんか懐かしいね、この並び。
subtitles.english: This line-up feels really nostalgic.

subtitles.original: なんか懐かしくない？この並び。
subtitles.english: Doesn't this line-up feel nostalgic?

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっとTwitterのヘッダーにしてる画像が...！
subtitles.english: Ah, wait! It's that image I use for my Twitter header!

subtitles.original: 前に撮った写真がありましたよね。
subtitles.english: There was a photo we took a while back.

subtitles.original: ちょっとこれ、再現できんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Can't we recreate that right now?

subtitles.original: 再現しちゃってみる？
subtitles.english: Should we try to recreate it?

subtitles.original: 私達の顔を横に並べると、
subtitles.english: It's the photo where if you line up our faces,

subtitles.original: 身長差で実はこうなっているっていう写真です。
subtitles.english: you can see how our heights actually compare.

subtitles.original: 懐かしいなー！
subtitles.english: This is so nostalgic!

subtitles.original: あ、こんなんだったわ！懐かしい。
subtitles.english: Ah, it was just like this! So nostalgic.

subtitles.original: デビュー当時、これで写真撮って、
subtitles.english: Back when we debuted, we took a photo like this,

subtitles.original: 私、辛かったんだよな。
subtitles.english: and it was so hard for me.

subtitles.original: プルプル...プルプル...足が...足が...
subtitles.english: Shaking... shaking... my legs... my legs...

subtitles.original: あ、これやりたかったんだよ、最後に。
subtitles.english: Ah, I really wanted to do this one last time.

subtitles.original: あー！ルナが！ルナが死んでる！
subtitles.english: Ah! Luna! Luna's dying!

subtitles.original: ダメージが！ルナ様ダメだよ！
subtitles.english: The damage! Luna-sama, don't give in!

subtitles.original: これ、膝曲げてバランスとるの意外と大変なんだよな。
subtitles.english: It's actually really hard to keep your balance with your knees bent like this.

subtitles.original: 結構大変だわ。
subtitles.english: It's quite tough.

subtitles.original: いやー、これやりたかったわ。忘れるとこだった。
subtitles.english: Man, I really wanted to do that. I almost forgot.

subtitles.original: やれてよかった、本当にね。
subtitles.english: I'm glad we could do it, truly.

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと待って、一つ思い出したんだけどさ、
subtitles.english: Wait a minute, I just remembered something.

subtitles.original: 私達さ、3Dになったらプロレスするって言ってなかったっけ？
subtitles.english: Didn't we say that we'd do pro-wrestling once we got our 3D models?

subtitles.original: プロレス！プロレス！言ってたわ！
subtitles.english: Pro-wrestling! Pro-wrestling! We did say that!

subtitles.original: 4期生全員でやるか？
subtitles.english: Shall all of us 4th gen members do it now?

subtitles.original: やったるかー！やったるかー！
subtitles.english: Let's do it! Let's do it!

subtitles.original: ルナとは戦えないのだわ。
subtitles.english: I can't fight with Luna-tan.

subtitles.original: 姫様なのに甘いのだわ。姫様なのに！
subtitles.english: She's too sweet for a princess. Even though she's a princess!

subtitles.original: よーし、おらおらおら！
subtitles.english: Alright, take this! Ora ora ora!

subtitles.original: お前！
subtitles.english: You!

subtitles.original: 4期生は強い！4期生は強い！
subtitles.english: 4th gen is strong! 4th gen is strong!

subtitles.original: ひり、にり...踏み潰されちゃう...
subtitles.english: I'm... I'm gonna get crushed...

subtitles.original: 落穂拾いだわ！
subtitles.english: That was like picking up scraps!

subtitles.original: 勝ったな。弱々しいな。
subtitles.english: I won. You're so weak.

subtitles.original: まだまだ出直してきなさい。
subtitles.english: You need to go back and train some more.

subtitles.original: ではね、そろそろ、みんな。
subtitles.english: Well then, it's about time, everyone.

subtitles.original: 私のアイドルとしての...
subtitles.english: My last performance...

subtitles.original: 最後のステージを見せたい！
subtitles.english: ...as an idol, I want to show it to you!

subtitles.original: ここって、アイドルだよね？
subtitles.english: We're idols here, aren't we?

subtitles.original: それはわからんけど...
subtitles.english: I'm not so sure about that...

subtitles.original: それはずっとできなかったけど...
subtitles.english: We were never really able to be that...

subtitles.original: アイドル、最後ぐらいは！
subtitles.english: At least at the very end!

subtitles.original: 最後ぐらいは、アイドルとして終わらせてくれ！
subtitles.english: At least let me end this as an idol!

subtitles.original: ずっとアイドルでいてほしい！
subtitles.english: I want you to be an idol forever!

subtitles.original: アイドルっぽいのやってよ！
subtitles.english: Do something idol-like!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ、新感覚アイドルなんだよな。
subtitles.english: Well then, I'm a new type of idol.

subtitles.original: というわけでね、最後に、
subtitles.english: And so, finally,

subtitles.original: 私のオリジナルソング、
subtitles.english: my original song,

subtitles.original: 桐生ココオリジナルソングをね、
subtitles.english: Kiryu Coco's original song...

subtitles.original: みんなに聞いてほしいです！
subtitles.english: I want everyone to hear it!

subtitles.original: 聞きたい！
subtitles.english: We want to hear it!

subtitles.original: ま、移動しようぜ！ここじゃあな...
subtitles.english: Well, let's move! This isn't the place...

subtitles.original: そうだね、いつもの、見慣れた、
subtitles.english: Right, to our usual, familiar...

subtitles.original: 私たちのステージに来いよ！
subtitles.english: ...stage! Come on!

subtitles.original: 遅いよ、みんな！
subtitles.english: You're too slow, everyone!
